title: Where in the World?
description: Search and filter by name or region, with sorting options for name and population
Explore detailed country information, including population, capital, currencies, languages, and border countries/territories
Interactive features with map links and a responsive design with dark mode support

title: IP Address Tracker
description: Search for any valid IPv4 or IPv6 address
Access detauked information including location, timezone, and ISP
View its location on an interactive map integrated with Leaflet and Google Maps

title: GlobeWeather
description: Search any city worldwide with autocomplete suggestions
Contains real-time weather data including temperature, wind speed, and humidity, provided by the OpenWeatherMap API
Dynamic backgrounds and unit toggle for metric/imperial measurements

title: GitHub User Finder
description: Search for any GitHub by username
View GitHub user details including name, location, join date, followers/following count, number of repositories, and links
Browse the user‚Äôs latest repositories, sorted by recent activity

title: Adversarial Insight ML
description: A Python package that assesses the robustness of image classification models against various adversarial attacks
Supports multiple attack methods, for thorough vulnerability testing
Provides an easy-to-use function and clear documentation for streamlined model testing and analysis
